name: Rocket Castle Defender - A Useful Study Tool
name_original: Rocket Castle Defender - A Useful Study Tool
description:
'Rocket Castle Defender' is a fun way to study keywords. Progress through the levels by destroying the oncoming missiles and correctly defining set words to complete the game.

Important! Instructions for use:

  • You can set the words + definitions you want to study through the 'options' (the spanner icon in the menu screen).
  • You will need a password to access these options. The password is 'TeacherAccess'.
  • Set the words and their corresponding definitions in the spaces provided. Please make sure to always add the words with a capital letter at the start, as the program does not recognise answers unless they are typed identically to the preset answer.
  • If you encounter any problems or have any questions, feel free to comment on the itch.io page or email me at haywireindiegamestudios@gmail.com

Also, while this game is free, it would still be awesome if you could leave me a donation (even as little as $1). Donating helps me to create future programs and is a great overall morale boost for me!
